    • Method Detail

      • addToEntryProviders

        public void addToEntryProviders(DataEntryProvider... inputDataProviders)
        Adds one or many entry providers to the display. Only occurs at the end of a display cycle
        Parameters:
        inputDataProviders - the entry provider(s) to add

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:

      • formattedDoubleToString

        public static java.lang.String formattedDoubleToString(double x,
                                       int places)
        Converts a double into a formatted string with desired number of decimal places. This method is more suitable than printing the raw double as this can overflow a line on the EV3 LCD.
        Parameters:
        x - the double to convert
        places - the number of decimal places to truncate x to
        Returns:
        a String representing x with places number of decimal places
